wikipedia_page.main: Bobby Thompson (born 27 July 1996) is a British racing driver, who competed in the British Touring Car Championship with Trade Price Cars Racing. He is also the defending VW Racing Cup champion also with Team HARD.

response: Jake was promoted to the AmD side of the team for 2020 and will be partnered by Sam Osborne, whilst the Trade Price Cars arm will be piloted by Bobby Thompson and ex British GT Champion James Gornall.

* Bobby Thompson (comedian) (1911–1988), British stand-up comedian, actor and entertainer
